闤字的基本解释

闤
huán
见“阛”。

闤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》户關切，平删，匣。］
“阛1”的繁体字。
(1)市垣。
(2)市巷。

闤字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　闤； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1342第18
【唐韻】戸關切【集韻】【韻會】胡關切，?音還。【說文】市垣也。从門，睘，意兼聲。【廣韻】闤闠。【古今注】闤，市垣也。　又【博雅】闤闠，道也。【張衡·西京賦】通闤帶闠。【註】闤，市營也。　又【正韻】烏還切，音彎。義同。

闤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
闤字的起名意思

暂无。

阛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huán]
["Guangyun" household concern, flat deletion, box. ]
Traditional characters for "阛1".
(1) City wall.
(2) City lanes.
阛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Men Zi Department] 　阛; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1342 18
[Tang Yun] You are concerned [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Hu is concerned, the sound is still there. [Said the text] Shiyuan also. Congmen, gaze, meaning and sound. [Guang Yun] Shun. [Ancient and Modern Note] Kan, Shi Yuan also.　[Bo Ya] Kan, Tao Ye. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Tongyu with a cast. [Note] Shu, also municipal.　[Zheng Yun] Wu is still cutting, sound bends. The same meaning.
